text: Heindl may refer to: * Bill Heindl, Sr. (1922, in Winnipeg, Manitoba - 1979), a Canadian ice hockey defenceman :* William "Bill" Wayne Heindl, Jr. (1946, Sherbrooke, Quebec - 1992), a Canadian professional ice hockey left winger; Son of the Sr. * Elmer W. Heindl (1910-2006), an American U.S. Army chaplain * Josef Heindl (1904-1943), a German officer
title: Heindl
